common.noMatches: Ga go kitla go fitlhelwa sepe se se tshwanelang

profile.title: Porofaele ya Modirisi
profile.mustLogin: O tshwanetse go tsena go bona dipeakanyo.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontsha molaetsa wa pele le o o fetotsweng
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Bontsha wa pele le wa phetolelo mmogo
profile.filterExplicit: Tlhopha diteng tse di sa tshwaneng
profile.enableReadReceipts: Dirisa tshedimosetso ya gore molaetsa o buletswe
profile.allowExplicitContent: Letla diteng tse di sa tshwaneng
profile.saveError: Phoso: Ga e a kgona go boloka dipeakanyo.
profile.avatarError: Phoso fa o ne o tsenya senepe.
profile.noPrivateKey: Ga go na senotlolo sa poraefete mo sediring seno go romelwa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tlhoma password go sireletsa backup ya gago:
profile.backupDownloaded: Backup e e sireleditsweng e laisitswe.
profile.importSuccess: Senotlolo sa poraefete se tsentswe mo sediring seno.
profile.importFailed: Go tsenya senotlolo go retetse (password e e sa siamang kgotsa faele e senyegile).
profile.keysRotated: Senotlolo se sesha se tlhamiwe mme sa romelwa.
profile.importKey: Tsenya backup e e sireleditsweng ya senotlolo
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa poraefete sa gago ga se tloge mo sediring seno. Romela kopi e e sireletsweng ka password go kgona go e busetsa mo sediring se sengwe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O mo pegong ya mahala — dirisa dikgetho tsa Letsatsi / Ngwedi tse di fa tlase. Ntšhafatsa go bula ditlhopha tse dingwe.
profile.backupTitle: Backup e e sireleditsweng le go tshwantsha didiriswa
profile.backupDesc: Tlhama backup e e sireleditsweng ka password ya dinotlolo tsa gago, mme o kgone go e busetsa mo sediring se sengwe.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Phimola fa app e sa dirisiwe
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntsa tshedimosetso fa molaetsa wa me o kopiwe
profile.unfollowFailed: Go kgaola go latela go retetse
profile.followHint: Dintlha tsa bone di tla bonala mo feed ya gago ya Balateli fa ba romela mo phuthegong ya Balateli kgotsa Phatlalatsa.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Go diragetse phoso mo karolong eno.
profile.forwarding: Go romela mopelelong wa megala le melaetsa
profile.callTextForwardingSection: Go romela mopelelong wa megala le melaetsa
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Go romela mehala le / kgotsa melaetsa
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Romela mehala le melaetsa e e tsenang kwa mogaleng kgotsa imeileng e e netefaditsweng. Mehala/melaetsa e e tswang e ka bontsha nomoro ya gago ya Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Tlhopha molaetsa kgotsa phaposi ya puisano go simolola go bua
